trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of application settings providers.

The SettingsProviderCollection class is a straightforward extension of the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection> class to provide for storage of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> objects.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> class uses this collection to manage the settings providers associated with each of its application settings properties through the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor that is implicitly provided.
Adds a new settings provider to the collection.
The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> is used as the storage key.

> [!CAUTION] > Although the Add method has a single <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase> parameter to match the signature of this same method in the base class <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection>, this method will throw an exception if the `provider` parameter is not of type <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase"></xref> to add to the collection.
The provider parameter is not of type .

-or- The <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name*> property of the provider parameter is null or an empty string. -or- A settings provider with the same <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name*> already exists in the collection.
The collection is read-only.
The provider parameter is .
Gets the settings provider in the collection that matches the specified name.
You can make a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection> read-only by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> method.

However, it is invalid to methods such as <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection.Clear%2A> on such a collection.
A <xref:System.String> containing the friendly name of the settings provider.

If found, the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"></xref> whose name matches that specified by the name parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The name parameter is .
The collection is read-only when setting this value.
